name: residentially
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to where people live: It's a residentially very mixed part of town. The archaeologists believe that the artefacts were from a residentially mobile community that lived in this region about 3,000 years ago.
More examplesFewer examplesAlthough the country is more socially and residentially integrated than it was just a decade ago, there are still significant divisions.The Chinese community in the city is residentially dispersed.The house prices in this residentially gentrified part of the city have increased considerably.
